familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $5,001 - $15,000 in (income type not disclosed) income from NUVEEN ENHANCED AMT-FREE MUNICIPAL CREDIT OPPORTUNITIES FUND (NVG) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: Nuveen Enhanced Amt-Free Municipal CredIT Opportunities Fund (Nvg)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $5,001 - $15,000 in (income type not disclosed) income from NUVEEN ENHANCED AMT-FREE MUNICIPAL CREDIT OPPORTUNITIES FUND (NVG) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. This line item represents holdings in both the Nuveen Municipal Opportunity Fund (NIO) and the Nuveen Enhanced AMT-Free Municipal Credit Opportunities Fund (NVG). NIO was merged into NVG in April of 2016.
familyMemberEthics.business: Nuveen Enhanced Amt-Free Municipal CredIT Opportunities Fund (Nvg)
